top.title: 'Mandate for change': Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayoral election
top.summary: It is a historic moment as Mamdani also becomes the first South Asian and first Muslim to lead the city.

top.title: 'One of us': Ugandan pride in New York mayor with roots in their country
top.summary: A professor describes Mamdani as "one of us" while some young Ugandans take inspiration from the 34-year-old's victory.

top.title: At least nine people killed after UPS cargo plane crashes in Kentucky
top.summary: Others were injured when the plane exploded during takeoff near  Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport.

top.title: MP wants Elon Musk's chatbot shut down over claim he enabled grooming gangs
top.summary: SNP MP Pete Wishart says he is seeking legal advice over the "disturbing" AI-generated social media post.

top.title: France moves to suspend Shein website as it opens first store in Paris
top.summary: The economy ministry said proceedings would last until Shein proved all of its content complied with French law.

top.title: Tesla says Musk should be paid $1tn - will shareholders agree?
top.summary: The car-maker is lobbying fiercely for the pay package, which is being voted on ahead of its AGM on Thursday.

title.#text: Amazon’s grocery store dreams are reshaping Whole Foods
The hottest trend in speedrunning is flipping a coin
Baseus’ solar-powered dash cam is down to its best price yet
